a:3:{i:0;a:6:{s:2:"id";s:1:"3";s:4:"fpid";s:1:"1";s:10:"identifier";s:8:"new_help";s:7:"keyword";s:6:"新人";s:5:"title";s:12:"新人须知";s:7:"message";s:27:"新手注册给100积分。";}i:1;a:6:{s:2:"id";s:1:"4";s:4:"fpid";s:1:"1";s:10:"identifier";s:0:"";s:7:"keyword";s:0:"";s:5:"title";s:12:"违规封号";s:7:"message";s:0:"";}i:2;a:6:{s:2:"id";s:1:"5";s:4:"fpid";s:1:"2";s:10:"identifier";s:0:"";s:7:"keyword";s:0:"";s:5:"title";s:12:"下载说明";s:7:"message";s:93:"已经下载过的付费文件下次可直接下载（如果有上调价格的则补加）。";}}
